Articles.Content:
So I landed a plane at the runway without crashing (hooray) and taxied it to behind the SPH because there is lots of room there. And that was the moment I realized the plane didn't have a ladder. I remembered that some IRL planes have ladders that move away and are not directly attached to the plane, but they are also small and easy to move and aren't powered by RTG's. I thought that I should have Kerbals that can take the ladder and carry it/wheel it around. This should probably be a mod with KAS or something.

Here are some examples I found on google.

Whadya guys thing?
